item.title: Pond is dry and full of tall weeds, 19th October
item.description:
I used to come here with my daughter to show her the local fauna. It's a disgrace what happened to this pond. It should be restored. We want a pond!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tetty Way, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned motorbike, 19th October
item.description:
Please do not respond with automatic message. This vehicle has been abandoned and reported for several months without action. Please can we have an update on when it is due to be removed. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyme Farm Road, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burnt out vehicle, 19th October
item.description:
Please do not respond with the automatic message. The police have advised that it is the responsibility of the local council to remove this vehicle. Please can we have an update on when the council intends on making this arrangement. It is a significant environmental and safety hazard that this vehicle remains here after several weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39,41,43, Lyme Farm Road, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant dumping of rubbish, 19th October
item.description:
Rubbish being dumped around the commercial bins on our street since they were moved. Large boxes and packaging are left outside the bins, blocking the pavement. Although it gets cleared regularly, the problem keeps returning. You need a long term fix.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish bags, 19th October
item.description:
